Auto Generated Documentations using Docstrings¶

Kmeans.K = 1¶

K is the number of clusters. K=1 by default, can be changed

Kmeans.alternating_bins_initialisation()[source]¶

Initialise clusters by alternating the bins to which the vectors are assigned

Kmeans.calculate_cb_vecs()[source]¶

Setup and calculate codebook vectors

Kmeans.in_order_initialisation()[source]¶

Assign the first m/K vectors to the first cluster and so on

Kmeans.m = 200¶

m is the size of the set of our training points

Kmeans.main()[source]¶

K-means clustering algorithm

Kmeans.n = 240¶

n is the number of features

Kmeans.unbalanced_initialisation(offset)[source]¶

Unevenly distributes vectors into clusters by placing offset number of vectors in the first cluster and evenly spreads the remaining vectors in the remaining clusters

Parameters:offset (int) – the first offset vectors are put in the first cluster
